type DnsPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制对网络上域名系统 (DNS) 服务器的访问权限。

span.span: Controls rights to access Domain Name System (DNS) servers on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认权限允许所有本地和 Intranet 区域的应用程序来访问 DNS 服务和 Internet 区域的应用程序没有 DNS 权限。The default permissions allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access DNS services, and no DNS permission for Internet zone applications.

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，该类或者允许无限制的 DNS 访问，或者不允许 DNS 访问。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class that either allows unrestricted DNS access or disallows DNS access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`state`是，则实例允许所有请求。If `state` is , the instance passes all demands. 如果`state`包含任何其他值，实例禁止所有命令。If `state` contains any other value, the instance fails all demands. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的实例类。The following example creates an instance of the class. summary.span: 创建当前权限实例的相同副本。

span.span: Creates an identical copy of the current permission instance.

span.span: A new instance of the class that is an identical copy of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份实例提供原始权限实例到 DNS 服务器的相同访问权限。A copy of a instance provides the same access to DNS servers as the original permission instance. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个现有的相同副本实例。The following example creates an identical copy of an existing instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回实例，它允许由这两个当前定义的访问权限实例和指定实例。The method returns a instance that allows the access defined by both the current instance and the specified instance. 任何请求必须通过这两个通过它们的交集的权限。Any demand must pass both permissions to pass their intersection. ## Examples 以下示例创建是当前权限实例的交集的权限实例与指定的权限实例。The following example creates a permission instance that is the intersection of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例是指定的子集实例，如果当前实例指定一组完全包含的操作由指定实例。The current instance is a subset of the specified instance if the current instance specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified instance. 如果方法将返回`true`，当前实例允许对 DNS 服务器访问不能超过指定实例。If the method returns `true`, the current instance allows no more access to DNS servers than does the specified instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法，以确定当前权限实例是否是指定的权限实例的子集。The following example uses the method to determine whether the current permission instance is a subset of the specified permission instance.
